He was forced to cut a check there on the spot. He doent care about us Veterans he cares about himself, you Trump Supporters are being duped. He defered 5 times when he was called to duty, yet he was playing sports. The man is a discrace to Veterans! Trump calls the media dishonest when they qoute his own comments. He is a very dishinest person. He claims at his ralleys he's going to create jobs, but NEVER says how.
BERNIE SANDERS 2016!!

You hear, and read these stories about illness, death, and lack of healthcare for our citizens, and you become overwhelmed with heartache. I can't for the life of me understand how people in power can hear these same type of stories daily, and continue to fight against healthcare for all. I can't even imagine the level of frustration that Senator Sanders goes through.

Besides, let's be honest here...Not many people marry anymore with the genuine intent to preserve their relationship and honor each other above all else. I've been married twice. First time was a mistake because we had nothing in common. Second time was a whirlwind and when it was good it was really good, but I found out way too late when I was most vulnerable that she had no intention of taking any responsibility for our marriage, but she had every intention of taking as much property and money as she could. And yes, I know, don't let my cynicism ruin anyone else's dream...I just think it's a good idea to be smart. Though if you have to consider a prenup, you probably shouldn't be getting married anyway.
Fox... we need more joy like this!
